text: N'abo abatalina kyebamanyi bagamba nti singa Katonda ayogera naffe butereevu, oba netuwebwa ekyamagero. Ekigambo ekyo n'abo abaabasooka baakyogera olwo nebafaanagana mu ndowooza zaabwe, so nga twannyonnyola obujulizi obw'olwatu obukakasa amazima g'ababaka be tutumye eri abantu abalina amagezi agafumiitiriza
